text: Hagi Isipi vahera Anumzana omani'nazanki, ama mopafi vahetfa mani'naze. Hagi hosizmimo'a hosi mani'nazanki avamura omani'naze. Ana hu'neankino Ra Anumzamo'a azama erisga huno Isipi vahera zamazeri haviza nehuno, agripinti'ma zamazahu zama eneriza vahe'enena zamazeri haviza hanige'za haviza hugahaze. Ana hanigeke taregamokea omanike magoka fanane hugaha'e.
